verses.name: Isaiah 36:13
verses.text: Then Rabshakeh stood, and cried with a loud voice in the Jews’ language, and said, Hear ye the words of the great king, the king of Assyria.

verses.name: Isaiah 36:14
verses.text: Thus saith the king, Let not Hezekiah deceive you: for he shall not be able to deliver you.

verses.name: Isaiah 36:15
verses.text: Neither let Hezekiah make you trust in the Lord, saying, The Lord will surely deliver us: this city shall not be delivered into the hand of the king of Assyria.
